item.description:
Join us for ACOUSTIC ELECTRONICA, returning to OBERON from its smash hit in February.

"A whole new level of music and spectacle that blends the virtuosity found in the classical concert hall with the infectious energy of the late-night dance club. The best of both worlds: artistic depth and irresistible appeal. It is sexy and classy, sensuous and stoic, irreverent and reverential."

http://www.cluboberon.com/events/acoustica-electronica

Details:

Friday, August 24, 2012
10:30 PM
Oberon, 2 Arrow Street, Cambridge, MA

Tickets are $25 each. Please note in your response if you have purchased a ticket(s).

We plan to meet before the show at 8:00 somewhere nearby in Harvard Square. Specifics to follow, once there is a better idea of numbers.
item.name: Acoustic Electronica at Oberon - Friday, August 24
